amendment.description: An amendment to strike the bill's provisions rescinding $50 million in VA medical care funding, and $156 million in VA hospital construction funding. To offset these amounts, the amendment increases the amount rescinded from the NASA science, aeronautics and technology account from $38 million to $244 million.

action.text: Mr. Livingston raised a point of order against the Obey amendment (A002). Mr. Livingston stated that the amendment sought to amend a paragraph previously amended and as such, could not be considered in order. The Chair sustained the point of order.
